CustomField.description: Master learning support / disability student account field. Used for HESA reporting
CustomField.label: Disability (HESA)

value.fullName: 95~ No known impairment, health condition or learning difference
value.label: 95~ No known impairment, health condition or learning difference

value.fullName: 51~ Learning difference such as dyslexia, dyspraxia or AD(H)D
value.label: 51~ Learning difference such as dyslexia, dyspraxia or AD(H)D

value.fullName: 53~ Social/communication conditions such as a speech and language impairment or an autistic spectrum condition
value.label: 53~ Social/communication conditions such as a speech and language impairment or an autistic spectrum condition

value.fullName: 54~ Long-term illness or health condition such as cancer, HIV, diabetes, chronic heart disease, or epilepsy
value.label: 54~ Long-term illness or health condition such as cancer, HIV, diabetes, chronic heart disease, or epilepsy

value.fullName: 55~ Mental health condition, challenge or disorder, such as depression, schizophrenia or anxiety
value.label: 55~ Mental health condition, challenge or disorder, such as depression, schizophrenia or anxiety

value.fullName: 56~ Physical impairment (a condition that substantially limits one or more basic physical activities such as walking, climbing stairs, lifting or carrying)
value.label: 56~ Physical impairment (a condition that substantially limits one or more basic physical activities such as walking, climbing stairs, lifting or carrying)

value.fullName: 57~ Deaf or have a hearing impairment
value.label: 57~ Deaf or have a hearing impairment

value.fullName: 58~ Blind or have a visual impairment uncorrected by glasses
value.label: 58~ Blind or have a visual impairment uncorrected by glasses

value.fullName: 59~ Development condition that you have had since childhood which affects motor, cognitive, social and emotional skills, and speech and language
value.label: 59~ Development condition that you have had since childhood which affects motor, cognitive, social and emotional skills, and speech and language

value.fullName: 96~ An impairment, health condition or learning difference not listed above
value.label: 96~ An impairment, health condition or learning difference not listed above
